text: Anɨb ak bɨ wog day nap nɨb anop agnɨgem, binɨb tap pɨpag dad owep ogɨnap agyokek, am pɨpag dad ownɨgel agak.9.37-38 Takaw anɨb ak, takaw paladaŋ lɨl agak. Tap mɨdup kuŋay yɨbɨl nep mɨdeb agak ak, binɨb okok kɨli God takaw ne nɨgɨnɨg mɨdebal agak. Binɨb tap pɨpag dad owep okok, binɨb God takaw ak agñɨbal agak. Pen bɨ wog day nap nɨb ak, God ne ke mɨdeb agak.
